lead_paragraph: Bath flyhalf George Ford can wave his England career goodbye if he makes the switch to French rugby to link up with his father Mike at Toulon, national coach Eddie Jones has said.

headline.print_headline: Bath's Ford Risks England Career if He Joins Toulon-Jones
headline.main: Bath's Ford Risks England Career if He Joins Toulon-Jones

snippet: Bath flyhalf George Ford can wave his England career goodbye if he makes the switch to French rugby to link up with his father Mike at Toulon, national coach Eddie Jones has said....
